title: Onde est√° Elisa?
overview: The life of the Menezes family changes radically after the disappearance of Elisa, the eldest daughter of Rui and Francisca Menezes. With the tragedy the dark secrets of each member of the family, of each friend, of each person that surrounded Elisa, are revealed. The suspicions, the paranoia, the digging up of stories from the past, the rivalries and the inevitable distribution of blame begins. In the midst of family conflicts many suspects are revealed, including their own parents, uncles, cousins, friends, former and current family employees.
